DESCRIPTION: When toughness is down to zero, get stunned.
Weakness Broken state. Get stunned and can not deplete toughness.
When toughness is down to zero, trigger all the #yweakness #ybreak effects
Deal damage at the start of the target's turn. Dot with same type and same amount will extend duration. Last for 2 turns by default.
When apply DEBUFF to enemy, increase by 1.
A group of 0 cost attack cards. They have #yretain effect and default toughness reduction is 10. They have extra effect and deals #ySuper #yBreak DMG when the enemies is in #yWeakness #yBreak.
Deal damage every 3 turns. Gain this power at the start of the game when you have #yPrana #yExtirpated in deck.
Deal damage based on toughness reduction when enemies is in #yWeakness #yBreak. Default reduction 4.
When attack, add 1 charge. When has 12 charge, deal damage 6 times and reduction 2.
